alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains; Spokane Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:11PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Kootenai and northeastern Spokane Counties through 645 PM PDT... At 610 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Millwood, or near Spokane, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Spokane, Spokane Valley, Millwood, Hauser, Trentwood, Dishman, Mead, Otis Orchards-East Farms, Green Acres, Newman Lake, Opportunity and Veradale. People attending Spokane Pavillion Concert - Zach Bryan should seek safe shelter immediately! This includes Interstate 90 in Washington between mile markers 280 and 293. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
